# ScamAI

> All-in-one AI Trust Platform for detecting synthetic media and deepfakes in real-time.

ScamAI (by Reality Inc.) provides API-based deepfake detection and synthetic media verification. The platform achieves 95.3% detection accuracy with processing times under 200ms. SOC 2 Type II and GDPR compliant.

## Products

- [Vision Detection](https://scam.ai/en/products/vision-detection): Detect AI-generated images and deepfake videos. Supports face swap detection, GAN-generated images, and diffusion model outputs.
- [Audio Detection](https://scam.ai/en/products/audio-detection): Identify synthetic voices, cloned audio, and AI-generated speech. Protects against voice phishing and audio fraud.
- [Scam Database](https://scam.ai/en/products/scam-database): Comprehensive database of known scams, fraud patterns, and synthetic media examples with real-time threat intelligence.

## Pricing

- Free tier: 200 images per month
- Base price: $0.05 per image
- Add-ons: $0.008 per image each (face attributes, liveness detection, ID document verification)

## API

RESTful API with JSON responses. Integration in under 10 minutes. API documentation available at [scam.ai/en/resources/documentation](https://scam.ai/en/resources/documentation).
